summary: The diff implements all five requirements (REQ-11 through REQ-15) with substantial coverage. REQ-11 backend generateReminders function is added in main.mo, REQ-12 RemindersPage with sidebar integration is implemented, REQ-13 AgendaInsightsPanel is built and integrated, REQ-14 CrmInsightsPanel is built and integrated, and REQ-15 FinancialInsightsPanel is built and integrated. Overall implementation looks complete with only a minor unrequested addition.

hallucinated_features.description: A backend/migration.mo file was added with a no-op migration module
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention any data migration module or schema versioning requirement. This file was not requested.
